file_insights.changes_summary: Added error handling with toast notifications instead of console logging
key_modifications: Imported useToast hook from ToastProvider component
Integrated showError and showSuccess functions from useToast
Replaced console.error calls with showError toast notifications for user-facing errors
Added showSuccess toast notification for successful contact creation
Maintained existing error catching in try-catch blocks while improving UX

patterns_discovered.description: Replacing console.error with user-facing toast notifications for better UX feedback
Using custom useToast hook to centralize error and success message delivery
patterns_discovered.benefit: Decouples error handling logic from component implementation

patterns_discovered.description: Providing both error feedback on failure and success feedback on completion

gotchas_discovered.description: Only two error paths are handled (list and create). Other API operations in the diff context (update, delete) may still use console.error
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Audit all contact API calls to ensure consistent error handling

gotchas_discovered.description: Error messages are generic ('Please try again') without specific error details or differentiation between error types
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Consider extracting error type information to provide more specific guidance to users

gotchas_discovered.description: showSuccess is called before setDialogOpen(false) and setFormData reset, which could cause UI state race conditions
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Consider reordering to reset form state before showing success message

approach_outcome.description: Successfully refactored error handling in ContactsPage to use toast notifications instead of console logging, improving user experience with visible feedback
key_accomplishments: Integrated ToastProvider for centralized notification management
Replaced 2 console.error calls with showError notifications
Added success notification for contact creation
Maintained existing error catching mechanisms while improving UX

recommendations.recommendation: Apply same toast-based error handling pattern to all other API call sites in ContactsPage (update, delete operations if present)
recommendations.rationale: Provides consistent user feedback across all operations

recommendations.recommendation: Parse error response objects to extract specific error messages instead of using generic 'Please try again' text
recommendations.rationale: Improves user guidance and helps debugging specific issues

recommendations.recommendation: Move success message display to after form reset to ensure clean state before notifying user
Add test cases for error and success toast notifications in ContactsPage
recommendations.rationale: Ensures error handling works correctly in all scenarios
